body.name: IDEALHOUSE Queen Size Bed Frame with Wooden Headboard, Industrial Queen Bed Platform Metal Bedframe No Box Spring Needed, 14 inch Easy to Assemble Noise Free Mattress Foundation, Rustic Brown

features: STURDY & DURABLE - Constructed with 9 support legs and 14 heavy-duty steel slats, the weight capacity of this queen size bed frame can stand max up to 700lbs for most familys needed. The Industrial wooden grain headboard and footboard provides better support to your mattress, you will feel very sturdy when lying on our queen bed.

EXTRA STORAGE SPACE - Our queen bed frame size is 81”L x 61.3”W x 37.2”H, weight: 77 pounds. 13.8'' Under-Bed Space make it a great option for under-bed storage such as suitcases, tools or even sweeping robot, it’s the best choice for space saving and keep your room tidy. No need to worry about limited storage space in the bedroom anymore.

VINTAGE HEADBOARD & FOOTBOARD - The combination of vintage MDF board & black metal bed frame takes a mild industrial look and rustic style without being overly trendy. This retro queen size bed frame is a sleek finishing decoration to your bedroom, suitable for most bedroom style.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN - What our queen size bed platform can bring to you is Non-shaky, Non-Slip, Noise Free and Non-squeaky. Also it is no box spring needed, you can directly put your mattress on it. This queen size bed frame with headboard are professionally designed with all parts well-crafted, I believe it's a trusted buying experience.

EASY ASSEMBLE & SERVICE - All the parts and tools of our queen platform bed frame are marked out in the manual. Clear assembly instruction helps people with zero assembly experience. It only takes around 60 minutes to complete the installation. Any problems with this queen bed frame, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with 24 hours professional customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IDEALHOUSE Queen Size Metal Bed Frame with Wooden Headboard and Footboard What Makes This Queen Size Bed Frame with Headboard Worth Getting? This well-crafted platform bed frame with rustic vintage wood headboard matches the country style that you want.Matte black metal constructed bed frame features a wood panel headboard and footboard for a minimalist look. Weight capacity:700 lbs.Sturdy, Durable, and Noise Free. This queen bed platform frame is very stable. Non-shaky, Non-Slip, Noise Free, and Non-squeaky. No Box Spring Needed.

Vintage High-grade MDF Board The headboard and footboard of wood grain have unparalleled touch and texture. Bring a retro atmosphere to your bedroom. Sturdy and Durable Frame Build with 9 legs and 14pcs of heavy-duty steel slats for stability and durability. You will feel very sturdy when laying on our bed frame. Noise Free Design The platform queen bed frame provides buckles that lock the metal slats tightly, and there are foot supports on both sides and in the middle, which prevents the noise from slats.
SPECIFICATION Size Queen Size Bed Frame Color Rustic board and black frame Dimensions 61.3"L x 81"W x 37.2"H Free Delivery Yes for all region Hassle-free Buying Yes for all customer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Strong frame. Looks nice.Reasonably priced. Would recommend for a person looking for a nice looking frame without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great bedframe for an incredible price
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this bedframe. It was easy enough to put together, definitely easier with a second person. very sturdy and honestly its gorgeous

reviews.reviewerName: Mattress is amazing. And you can’t beat the price.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Packaging completely sucks, not enough padding. Bed came in beat up and slightly bent. The instructions could be better, but all in all it’s decent for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only problem which I expected for online shopping is always “missing something”. I took photos. It was good bed frame and beautiful. I assembled by myself it took me 2-3 hrs may be. Feel great that you can do it without anyone help. So far it’s sturdy. It’s Heavy materials. I gave 4⭐️ because of 1 missing part. Make it complete so that you get 5 ⭐️.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love everything about this bed, from purchase, delivery, and all the way to set up and actual use— the bed is simply a WINNER in my book. The metal frame itself is sturdy and the wood panels don’t look like composite wood at all. Assembly seemed fairly simple, didn’t require and didn’t take long to build. Delivery came right on time and all the components of the bed came labeled and packaged neatly in a long, flat box which made the building process easier. Didn’t need any special tools either—everything you need is in the box as my mister said—but arguably some help with a Phillips screwdriver would be good too if you have one just laying around your home. It took the mister about an hour to get it done and I was pleasantly surprised at how effortless he made it seem from start to finish. Don’t let the price fool you because quality was certainly not compromised for affordability. It looks like a piece from a high end furniture store but with a Walmart price tag, making it such a joy to buy and own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Loudest bed ever
reviews.reviewText: This bed is the loudest bed I have ever owned my dog loves it squeaks let alone me or my husband rolling over in bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this bed frame for my son and daughter in law for Christmas. It was easy to put together, they love it. The bed is sturdy and they have room underneath to store stuff if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and no noise
reviews.reviewText: Little bit of a pain to assemble with all of the screws but it is very sturdy, no noises and it’s very high quality for the price.
